text: Malcolm Lewis Heron is an electrical engineer at James Cook University in Townsville, Queensland, Australia. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for his contributions to the application of radio science to oceanic and terrestrial remote sensing. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Australian computer scientists Category:James Cook University faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Malcolm Lewis Heron
